pkgmetadata.longdescription: Influential Case Detection Methods for Factor Analysis and Structural Equation Models // Tools for detecting and summarize influential cases that can affect exploratory and confirmatory factor analysis models as well as structural equation models more generally (Chalmers, 2015, doi:10.1177/0146621615597894; Flora, D. B., LaBrish, C. Chalmers, R. P., 2012, 10.3389/fpsyg.2012.00055).
